about_the_game:
Lore

You are completely desperate in life, on your shoulders hung too much debt and you fear for your future, in front of your eyes flashes all the horror of what you will have to go through, but suddenly you come across an ad for a game in which you can win a lot of money, this more than covers your debts. Are you willing to put your life on the line to walk away with pockets full of money?

Tactics and Strategy

Outsmart your opponents and leave the tavern as the last survivor, what bullet will you get this time? A blank or a...
Let's find out, pull the trigger, set an example for the rest of the table. After all, the victory looks so tempting, just a little bit left and the money is yours.

Items

Get various bonuses for your courage and determination. Who knows, maybe thanks to this very thing, you can turn the game in your favor, quickly make a choice, otherwise someone will take advantage of your doubts.

Customization

Stand out among the rest, change the image of your character, pick up your style that will reflect you at the round table of the chosen ones.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a top-down, turn-based multiplayer game where players shoot each other with a shotgun, fighting for money. Using a shotgun, the player can also commit suicide. The game contains frequent violence, is not appropriate for all ages and may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

short_description: Play Russian Roulette in western setting with a shotgun loaded with live and blank shells. Use items to gain a tactical advantage. Fight against friends or random people at the same table of up to 8 people and become the last survivor with full pockets of money.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
